amendment.description: Amendment requires the Congressional Budget Office to review and report on the accuracy of dynamic scoring estimates 5 fiscal years after any dynamically scored bill is enacted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-400 to require the Congressional Budget Office to review the accuracy of the macroeconomic impact analysis for any enacted bill or joint resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
